Title: A Woman Under the Influence
Actors: Peter Falk, Gena Rowlands, Fred Draper, Lady Rowlands
Plot: Peter Falk is a blue collar man trying to deal with his wife's mental instability. He fights to keep a semblance of normality in the face of her bizarre behavior, but when her actions affect their children, he has her committed.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 5 nominations.
